content: this legal text discusses a court case in ghent involving a former spouse and their expartner the judge has made a decision regarding the continuation of mortgage repayment for their joint home the judge ruled that this repayment should be considered as income for the exspouse and that the exhusband assuming responsibility for the mortgage qualifies as a benefit the decision emphasizes the importance of assessing the current situation and potential future events the appellants claim regarding the amount of this benefit was upheld by the judge the decision refers to a previous case and an article from the rmi decision the text also mentions the responsibility of the exspouse for repaying the mortgage loan and the need to consider the current situation and any future uncertainties the integration of income is important for a decent standard of living and benefiting the neighborhood the text further discusses the appellants argument regarding housing costs and mortgage repayments but the court finds that the assumption of responsibility is not explicitly stated in the relevant decision the appellant is justified in considering the housing benefit and half of the monthly mortgage repayments
